text: Lynn Alvarez (born September 6, 1985) is an American mixed martial artist. She competes in the strawweight division for Invicta FC and has competed for Bellator. ==Mixed martial arts record== |- | Loss | align=center| 6–5 | JJ Aldrich | Decision (unanimous) | Invicta FC 20:
